column3: Includes stock-based compensation as follows: Cost of revenue for year ended December 31, 2011, 2010, and 2009 were: $2,971, $2,401, and $2,285 in thousands respectively. Selling and marketing for year ended December 31, 2011, 2010, and 2009 were: $13,085, $11,766, and $10,555 in thousands respectively. Technology and content for year ended December 31, 2011, 2010, and 2009 were: $13,505, $11,665, and $13,424 in thousands respectively. General and administrative for year ended December 31, 2011, 2010, and 2009 were: $34,286, $26,675, and $29,492 in thousands respectively.
